results.name: Blue Marvel
results.description: Ongoing: Your other cards have +1 Power.

results.name: Brood
results.description: On Reveal: Add 2 Broodlings to this location with the same Power.

results.name: Bucky Barnes
results.description: When this is destroyed, create the Winter Soldier in its place.

results.name: Cable
results.description: On Reveal: Put the bottom card of your opponent's deck into your hand.

results.name: Captain America
results.description: Ongoing: Your other cards at this location have +1 Power.

results.name: Captain Marvel
results.description:
At the end of the game, move to a location that wins you the
game. (If possible)

results.name: Carnage
results.description: On Reveal: Destroy your other cards here. +2 Power for each destroyed.

results.name: Cerebro
results.description: Ongoing: Your highest Power cards get +2 Power.

results.name: Cloak
results.description: On Reveal: Next turn, both players can move cards to this location.

results.name: Colleen Wing
results.description: On Reveal: Discard the lowest-cost card from your hand.

results.name: Colossus
results.description: Ongoing: Can't be destroyed, moved, or have its Power reduced.

results.name: Cosmo
results.description: Ongoing: On Reveal abilities won't happen at this location.

results.name: Crossbones
results.description: You can only play this at locations where you are winning.

results.name: Crystal
results.description: On Reveal: If this is at the middle location, shuffle your hand into your deck and draw 3 cards.

results.name: Cyclops
results.description: Let's move, X-Men.

results.name: Dagger
results.description:
When this moves to a location,
+2 Power for each card your
opponent has there.

results.name: Daredevil
results.description:
On turn 5, you get to see your opponent's plays before you
make your own.

results.name: Darkhawk
results.description: Ongoing: +2 Power for each card in your opponent's deck.

results.name: Dazzler
results.description: Ongoing: If you have 4 cards at each location, +6 Power.

results.name: Deadpool
results.description: When this is destroyed, return it to your hand with double the Power.

results.name: Death
results.description: Costs 1 less for each card destroyed this game.

results.name: Deathlok
results.description: On Reveal: Destroy your other cards at this location.

results.name: Debrii
results.description: On Reveal: Add a Rock to each other location, for both players.

results.name: Destroyer
results.description: On Reveal: Destroy your other cards.
